item.title: Search, Launch, and Newspaper in KDE Plasma Netbook 4.5
item.description: These 2 videos show how the search, launch, and newspaper features will look in the Plasma Netbook Shell of the upcoming KDE Software Compilation 4.5.

item.title: KDE 4.4 Introduces Netbook Interface
item.description: Yesterday the availability of KDE Software Compilation 4.4, Caikaku, was announced. This new release comes with several new features including a netbook interface.
